help:
Return the metadata of a dataset (package) and its resources.

    :param id: the id or name of the dataset
    :type id: string
    :param use_default_schema: use default package schema instead of
        a custom schema defined with an IDatasetForm plugin (default: False)
    :type use_default_schema: bool

    :rtype: dictionary

result.release-notes: Contains personal information and also other senstivie information that cannot be published without a High Court Order

organization.description:
The Air Accidents Investigation Branch (AAIB) investigates civil aircraft accidents and serious incidents in the UK and overseas with a view to the preservation of life and the avoidance of accidents in the future. It does not apportion blame or liability.

AAIB works with the Department for Transport

http://www.aaib.gov.uk
organization.title: Air Accident Investigation Branch
organization.name: air-accident-investigation-branch

result.name: adam_1
result.notes: Air accident investigation database that collates initial accident information and facilitates the ongoing investigation, through to recommendations and final report

extras.value: Contains personal information and also other senstivie information that cannot be published without a High Court Order

result.title: ADAM
